formulas.name: opportunitySubTypeOutput
formulas.expression: IF( {!Type} = "Resource & Logistics", IF( NOT( ISBLANK({!Sub_Type_RnL}) ), {!Sub_Type_RnL}, "Error" ), IF( {!Type} = "Site Operations", IF( NOT( ISBLANK({!Sub_TypeSiteOperations}) ), {!Sub_TypeSiteOperations}, "Error" ), IF( {!Type} = "Compliance Services", IF( NOT( ISBLANK({!Sub_TypeComplianceSchemes}) ), {!Sub_TypeComplianceSchemes}, "Error" ), IF( {!Type} = "Consultancy", IF( NOT( ISBLANK({!Sub_TypeConsultancy}) ), {!Sub_TypeConsultancy}, "Error - GLEN" ), "Error - Glen" ))))

value.stringValue: Invited to quote for specific work

fields.name: contactRoleHeader
fields.fieldText: Please assign the primary contact to this opportunity:

fields.name: Client_Project_Value
fields.helpText:
For better pipeline planning and future forecasting, we want to capture the total project value to the client.


For example: the opportunity is to work with "Company X Construction" on the "M6 Resurfacing Project" - Enter the total project value to Company X Construction here, E.G. £400,000,000

validationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value greater than £100.
